text: Backend Engineer specializing in Python, Docker, and AWS-based microservices.
Built and maintained backend services in Python, deploying via Docker and Kubernetes on AWS.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Designed scalable REST APIs with PostgreSQL; improved query latency by 18%.
Distributed Monitoring Tool – Developed a Prometheus-based monitoring system for microservices, improving uptime by 15%.
B.S. Computer Science, Arizona State University
